alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, Oneida and western Langlade Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over north-central Wisconsin. These storms were moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tripoli, Tomahawk, Woodboro, Rhinelander, Newbold and Crystal Lake Scout Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
